pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Indiana Broadcasters Pioneers: Oral History Project
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists of interviews of Indiana's early broadcasters and papers relating to the preparation of a book-length manuscript on the state's broadcast pioneers. Includes tapes and transcripts of 26 Indiana pioneer broadcasters, covering topics in Hoosier broadcasting from 1926-mid-l990s.
